articles.title: SA's Schoenmaker wins GOLD, smashes world record to make history in Tokyo - News24
articles.description: Star swimmer Tatjana Schoenmaker claimed South Africa's first gold Olympic medal in Tokyo as she won the women's 200m breaststroke final on Friday, setting a new world record in the process.
articles.content:
Star swimmer Tatjana Schoenmaker claimed South Africa's first Olympic gold medal in Tokyo as she won the women's 200m breaststroke final on Friday, setting a new world record in the process.
